content: यूपः [यु-पक् पृषो° दीर्घः; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 3. 27</ls>] {@--1@} A sacrificial post (usually made of bamboo or Khadira wood) to which the victim is fastened at the time of immolation; अपेक्ष्यते साधुजनेन वैदिकी श्मशानशूलस्य न यूपसत्क्रिया <ls>Ku. 5. 73</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 44.</ls> {@--2@} A trophy.
